_source.text: [18] He (salAllahu 'alayhi wa sallam) also said, "There are four things in Paradise that are better than Paradise itself - remaining eternally in Paradise is better than Paradise; being served by the angels in paradise is better than Paradise; being in the company of the Prophets in Paradise is better than Paradise; and gaining Allah's pleasures in Paradise is better than Paradise itself.
